profileData.description: I’m a Front-end Developer with nearly 8 years of experience, working regularly with product team and back-end developers. I’m proficient in various JavaScript frameworks especially Angular and have a solid background in responsive design for both web and mobile projects. My keen attention to detail and ability to adapt to any project environment help me consistently deliver effective solutions.

projects.title: Makati Medical Society Website Application
descriptions: Created website app for Makati Medical Society with member information and messaging tools.
Utilized JSX, CSS, ReactJS, ReduxJS, and Firebase as Front-End Developer.

projects.title: Electric Studio Website Application
descriptions: As a Full Stack Developer, I actively participated in the revamp and expansion of Electric Studio\'s website application.
Improved existing project with outdated frameworks and added new features for client and admin sides.
Utilized HTML5, SASS, AngularJS, Python, and MongoDB for responsive UI and seamless functionality.
Upgraded website allowing customers to book cycling classes online, with admin web app for content management.

projects.title: DevLive Website and Mobile Application
descriptions: As a Full Stack Developer, I contributed to mobile Android app and website for Filipino citizens and local government units.
App allowed users to view, provide feedback, and report on government local projects.
Project owned by UNDP and partnered with government agencies for transparency and citizen participation.
Utilized HTML5, SASS, Angular 5, Ionic 3, Parse Server, and MongoDB for user-friendly platform promoting effective project management and transparency.

projects.title: Electric Studio Mobile Application
descriptions: As a Front-End Developer, I Rewrote Electric Studio iOS app using HTML5, SASS, and Ionic 4 Angular.
Updated framework and implemented new API for improved performance and user experience.
Allowing Customers to conveniently book and manage indoor cycling classes on their iPhones, streamlining class reservations.

projects.title: Gifmo Admin Portal Website Application
descriptions: I served as the Technical Team Leader and Front-End Developer, successfully rewriting the admin website for the GIFMO cards system.
Our task involved migrating the website to an Angular 7 project and completely revamping the admin API using KoaJS and PostgreSQL.
The outcome was an efficient and user-friendly system, facilitating smooth management of partners, cards, users, and inventory.
I utilized HTML5, SASS, and Angular 7 to create a responsive interface, ensuring an enhanced user experience.

projects.title: Electric Studio Website & Mobile Application Rewrite
descriptions: As a Front-End Developer, I enhanced the Electric Studio website application for online class bookings, removing Python/MongoDB dependencies, and rewriting the project with a separate KoaJS/PostgreSQL backend and Angular 9/Ionic 4 frontend.
The result was a more efficient system for class reservations and an admin web application to manage website content effectively.
I ensured a responsive and user-friendly interface, utilizing HTML5, SASS, Ionic, and Angular.

projects.title: Sun IP Website Application
descriptions: As a Front-End Developer, I maintained and enhanced a website application that provided translation and foreign filing services for intellectual property, utilizing HTML5, SASS, Angular 7, Jasmine, and Karma to ensure a user-friendly interface.
My tasks included developing new features for each version, enabling effective project/task management, and facilitating communication for all users.

projects.title: Park Evaluations Website Application
descriptions: As a Front-End Developer, my role involved maintaining and improving a website application that provided foreign credential evaluation and immigration services.
I utilized HTML5, SASS, Angular 7, Jasmine, and Karma to ensure a user-friendly interface.
My tasks included developing new features for each version, offering effective project/task management, and communication tools for users.

projects.title: Park Advertising Website Application
descriptions: As a front-end developer, my responsibilities included creating and maintaining a new website application within the existing park evaluations project.

The application offered perm advertising services, immigration-based recruitment, and consulting for lawyers and law firms, alongside management and communication tools for users to monitor their projects and tasks.
I ensured a responsive and user-friendly interface using HTML5, SASS, Angular 7, Jasmine, and Karma.
Additionally, I developed new features for future versions, enhancing the application's capabilities and improving the overall user experience.

projects.title: Blue Compass Solution
descriptions: As a front-end developer, I developed new features for the application, intended for presentation to potential clients by the demo team.
The application offers comprehensive and innovative IT solutions for efficient health and human services delivery.
The suite includes various modules tailored to meet the distinct and intricate needs of the agencies and organizations it serves.
I utilized the Angular 13 framework to create a new temporary feature, ensuring a smooth and seamless presentation by the demo team across different environments in the application.
